pr_title: Reorganize config, make it work in mixin plugins

timeline.author: Zidane

timeline.bodyText:
This is actually a fine change with no TODO needed. DimensionType specifying if I'll generate spawn on load is just a Forge feature. This call will likely be changed to do...
ModWorldHooks.shouldGenerateSpawnOnLoad(DimensionType dimensionType);
timeline.author: Zidane

timeline.message:
Reorganize config, make it work in mixin plugins

A bunch of rearrangement to better sort out which options are available
per-world, and which options are global only.

Adds a usable versioning system.
